tool_description: Create and easily send invoices via email through our API.
name: Invoice API
title: Invoice API

api_list.name: Get Invoice by Id
Get All Invoices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://invoice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/getAllInvoices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "invoice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://invoice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/getAllInvoices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "invoice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
